bibl.title: Urban Connections: Arsinoe, Antinoopolis and Hermopolis in the Papyri.
bibl.note: Argues that Arsinoe played an important part in shaping the nature of the new founded city of Antinoopolis and that Hermopolis developped a long-term interconnection with Antinoopolis. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality

bibl.seg: Myrto Malouta, Urban Connections: Arsinoe, Antinoopolis and Hermopolis in the Papyri.

Eva Subías, Pedro Azara, Jesús Carruesco, Ignacio Fiz & Rosa Cuesta (edd.), The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality = Documenta. 22 (Tarragona, 2011) pp. 49-55, 1 graphique; - 220.

Argues that Arsinoe played an important part in shaping the nature of the new founded city of Antinoopolis and that Hermopolis developped a long-term interconnection with Antinoopolis. - Avec résumé en anglais.
